ValidationRule.description: Prevents user from moving from Negotiate and Resolve to subsequent stages when Account Record Type is Prospect or Account Group is not Sold To AND Direct Sales to Ultimate Consignee = TRUE AND "Customer Account Creation Requested On" is blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OpportunityRTIndirectStandard, OR ( Account.RecordType.Name = $Label.AccountProspect, TEXT ( Account.Account_Group__c ) <> $Label.AccountGroupSoldTo ), ISBLANK ( Customer_Account_Creation_Requested_On__c ), NOT ( CloseDate < TODAY() ), Direct_Sale_to_Ultimate_Consignee__c = True, NOT ( OR ( TEXT ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageClosedLost, TEXT ( PRIORVALUE ( StageName )) = $Label.OpportunityStageClosedLost, TEXT ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageClosedAbandoned, TEXT ( PRIORVALUE ( StageName )) = $Label.OpportunityStageClosedAbandoned, TEXT ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageClosedWon, TEXT ( PRIORVALUE ( StageName )) = $Label.OpportunityStageClosedWon, TEXT ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageCreate, TEXT ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageQualify, TEXT ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageDevelop, TEXT ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageProve, TEXT ( StageName ) = $Label.OpportunityStageNegotiateResolve ) ), TEXT ( Account.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusObsolete, TEXT ( Account.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusPendingObsolete, TEXT ( Ultimate_Consignee__r.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusObsolete, TEXT ( Ultimate_Consignee__r.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusPendingObsolete, TEXT ( Distributor__r.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusObsolete, TEXT ( Distributor__r.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusPendingObsolete, TEXT ( Lessor_Customer__r.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusObsolete, TEXT ( Lessor_Customer__r.Account_Status__c ) <> $Label.AccountStatusPendingObsolete, NOT ( OR ( ISCHANGED ( Is_Updated_By_System__c ), Is_Updated_By_System__c = true, $Profile.Name = $Label.ProfileSystemAdmin, $Profile.Name = $Label.ProfileDataSteward ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please indicate date on which Customer (Sold-To) Account creation was requested. To do so, upgrade Sold-To by navigating to account record and clicking "Upgrade Request".
